REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f3214 reute r f BC-CLEVELAND-CLIFFS-INC 10-19 0078

TEXT.TITLE: CLEVELAND-CLIFFS INC <CLF> 3RD QTR NET
TEXT.BODY:
Shr loss nine cts vs loss 1.03 dlrs Net profit 100,000 vs loss 11.6 mln Revs 125.2 mln vs 71.8 mln Nine mths Shr loss 2.46 dlrs vs loss 98 cts Net loss 26.9 mln vs loss 8.5 mln Revs 355.4 mln vs 215.6 mln NOTE: 1987 qtr includes loss 5.9 mln dlrs non-recurring after-tax charges due almost entirely to the company's recent buyout of its Tilden Mine debt obligations.
1987 nine mths includes loss 23.7 mln dlrs pre-tax charge to reduce the carrying value of the company's 17 land drilling rigs. 1987 nine mths includes pre-tax gain 1.2 mln dlrs on sale of uranium reserves. 1986 nine mths includes pre-tax gain 20.6 mln dlrs on sale of iron ore interest in western Australia. Reuter
